titles.title: LET YOUR GLORY FILL THIS HOUSE

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let your glory fill this house
Let your presence fill this place
Let each vessel offer up to you
That sweet sacrifice of praise
Chorus: 2x
For You alone are Holy
And You alone are Worthy
You deserve the glory
Jesus, You are Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Que tu casa sea llena
De tu Gloria y tu presencia.
Ofrecemos sacrificio a ti
Grato y dulce de alabanza.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Solo tú eres Santo,
Solo tú eres digno,
Tu mereces gloria,
Tú eres Señor.
